mapper.select: SELECT thp.node_id, thn.device_type, thn.node_name, thp.device_id, thd.ip, thd.port, thd.device_instance_number, thd.description, thd.network_number, thd.station, thd.type, thp.field_id, thf.field_name, thf.field_description, thp.bacnet_object_type, thp.instance_number FROM t_hvac_point thp LEFT JOIN t_hvac_device thd ON thp.device_id=thd.id AND thd.is_active=1 LEFT JOIN t_hvac_node thn ON thp.node_id=thn.id AND thn.is_active=1 LEFT JOIN t_hvac_field thf ON thp.field_id=thf.id AND thf.is_active=1 WHERE thp.is_active=1
